				[1708] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'MaxUSee 20-60x60 HD Spotting Scope with Tripod, Carrying Bag and Universal Smartphone Adapter'
				[1710] paragraph ''
					StaticText "This spotting scope has a powerful zoom magnification range from 20X to 60X which can meet your different observation needs. Along with the Smartphone adapter, this spotting scope not only provides you a wide HD optics zoom vision but also brings the beautiful world close to you and displays it dynamically on your phone's screen. Especially perfect for target shooting, hunting, bird watching, wildlife watching, hiking, camping, scenery, moon viewing etc."
				[1716] table ''
					[1717] rowgroup ''
						[1718] row ''
							[1719] columnheader '2'
								[1721] paragraph ''

						[1734] row ''
							[1735] cell '* FEATURES: Fully multi-coated lens and high quality BAK4 prism increase light transmission, deliver bright, clear, high-contrast images even in low-light conditions. Variable 20X to 60X magnification and dynamic lens focusing system makes it easy to zoom in on target. 45 degree angled eyepiece provides more comfortable viewing. Durable Aluminum Framework and Rubber Armor. The eyepiece shield can be stretched out to protect the eyepiece. Comes with the universial phone adapter which enables you to take videos and images.'
								[1737] heading '* FEATURES:'

									[1740] listitem ''
										ListMarker '•'

									[1742] listitem ''

									[1746] listitem ''

									[1750] listitem ''
										ListMarker '•'
										StaticText 'Comes with the universial phone adapter which enables you to take videos and images.'

							[1753] cell '* SPECIFICATION: Magnification: 20X -60X Objective lens diameter: 60mm Eyepiece diameter: 16mm Distance of Exit Pupil: 13-16mm Diameter of Exit Pupil: 1.3-4.0mm Field of view: 63-126ft/1000 yard Size: 340X90X165mm Weight: 600g'

				[1808] heading 'INSTRUCTION:'
				[1809] paragraph ''
				[1810] list ''
					[1811] listitem ''
						ListMarker '0.'
						StaticText 'Put the Spotting scope onto the platform of the tripod (1) and Screw it tightly.'
					[1813] listitem ''
						ListMarker '0.'
						StaticText 'To make an approximate sighting of the instrument, adjust the lever (2) that allows the scope to rotate on its central axis.'
					[1815] listitem ''
						ListMarker '0.'
						StaticText 'Turn the Zoom power down to 20X, rotate the Focus ring (3) until you have obtained the clearest image possible.'
					[1817] listitem ''
						ListMarker '0.'
						StaticText 'Rotate the Zoom ring (4) in order to vary the magnification from 20X-60X. Increased magnification requires adjustment of the Focus ring.'
				[1819] paragraph ''
				[1820] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'NOTES:'
				[1822] paragraph ''
				[1823] list ''
					[1824] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Please turn out the movable eyepiece cup when you are without glasses, and turn in the movable eyepiece cup when you are with glasses.'
					[1826] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Always begin viewing at a low magnification and increase steadily until the best magnification, compatible with the observed subject and its environment is achieved.'
					[1828] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'With an increased magnification there is a decrease in luminosity and a reduction of the magnified area.'
				[1830] paragraph ''
				[1843] image '6', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/c75f88d2-788c-485d-b217-81f61dcbc0bc.__CR0,0,1421,1421_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
				[1846] heading 'HOW TO USE THE SMART PHONE ADAPTER'
				[1847] paragraph ''
				[1848] list ''
					[1849] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'This Spotting scope comes with a universal Smart Phone Adapter that can be compatible with Telescope, Binoculars, Monocular, Spotting Scope and Microscope. You can capture images and video through this spotting scope and it is very easy to use.'
					[1851] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Step 1: Mount the clamp to the eyepiece of your spotting scope.'
					[1853] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "Step 2: Adjust the phone holder and fix your cell phone into the adapter, center your phone's camera over the eyepiece, and use the knobs to secure the adapter in place."
					[1855] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Step 3: Adjust the focus ring of the spotting scope to ensure that you can see clear image on your phone, then zoom the camera to be full screen.'
					[1857] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'NOTE: The image you see from the phone at the beginning is just a small circle size, you can zoom the phone camera to see the full screen image.'
				[1859] paragraph ''
				[1868] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1871] list ''
					[1872] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Zoom Magnification 20X-60X - Powerful zoom magnification runs from 20x to 60x allows you to lock onto the target and zoom in for more details. 45 Degree angled eyepiece offers comfortable viewing. Wide Field of View brings nature closer to you.'
					[1874] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'FMC Optical Lens & BAK4 Prism - Fully multi-coated lens and high quality BAK4 prism increase light transmission, deliver bright, clear, high-contrast images even in low-light conditions.'
					[1876] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Compact, Lightweight & Durable - Compact and Lightweight Spotting Scope is ideal for adults and kids for travel, hiking and camping. Durable framework and high-quality rubber armor provide non-slip grip, shock-proof grip and durable external protection, which enables this spotting scope to withstand the toughest weather conditions.'
					[1878] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Stable Tripod & Carrying bag - The tripod provides you stable observation from any angles. The rugged, specially designed carrying bag holds the spotting scope and all accessories for easy traveling and storage.'
					[1880] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Universal Smartphone Adapter - Comes with a universal smartphone adapter that you can use cell phone for video camera and image capturing to explore the nature of the world easily through the phone screen.'

step_data.thought: I'm already on the product page for the MaxUSee 20-60x60 Zoom HD Spotting Scope. I need to check if it comes with a phone adapter. Looking at the product title, I can see it explicitly mentions 'Phone Adapter' in the name: 'MaxUSee 20-60x60 Zoom HD Spotting Scope with Tripod, Carrying Bag and Phone Adapter'. Additionally, in the product description, I can find more evidence. Under the 'PACKAGE INCLUDED:' section, it lists '1 x Phone adapter' as one of the included items. There's also a section titled 'HOW TO USE THE SMART PHONE ADAPTER' which provides instructions for using the included phone adapter. Furthermore, in the 'Product Quick Look' section, it mentions 'Universal Smartphone Adapter - Comes with a universal smartphone adapter that you can use cell phone for video camera and image capturing'. Based on all this information, it's clear that the MaxUSee 20-60x60 Zoom HD Spotting Scope does indeed come with a phone adapter.
step_data.action: stop('Yes, the MaxUSee 20-60x60 Zoom HD Spotting Scope definitely comes with a phone adapter. This is confirmed in the product title, package contents list which specifically includes "1 x Phone adapter\
